title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.2, when opening the ImageAnalyzer example in the application, it is observed that the scrollbars are enabled. Although they can be moved around, they do not have any effect. Additionally, when opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not perform any action.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the application using Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.2. 2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and movable, but they do not have any effect. 4. Open a small image, like an icon, to see that the scrollbars are misleading and do not perform any action.
